channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AK
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AK

item.title: Report X-2025010709
item.description:
Report X-2025010709

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-23T21:13:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-11
  • City: ANCHORAGE
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On 1/13/2025 at approximately 1030, Dangerous Goods Administration received a call from Employee 261690 at the ramp facility in Anchorage, reporting undeclared dangerous goods. The shipment consisted of one fiberboard box, containing 10 inner boxes, and each of those contained 10 plastic bags containing safety matches. The shipment was flagged and opened by the Customs division. The Commercial Invoice identified the inner contents as "arithmetical bar"; however, Customs discovered a contradicting image in X-ray screening. Upon making the discovery, Customs submitted the package to FedEx Dangerous Goods department for proper reporting. The shipment was not prepared in accordance with IATA Regulations missing the required markings, labeling, packaging and paperwork. The shipment is being held, pending an FAA investigation.

item.title: Report X-2025010766
item.description:
Report X-2025010766

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-23T21:13:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-21
  • City: ANCHORAGE
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Package was inbound to the US and customs conducted a check. Upon the check it was discovered that the package would not be allowed into the US. Package was then taken to the area in ANC that disposes of packages that are not allowed into the US. Before disposal it was discovered this package acutally contained Undeclared DG. Upon that discovery DG Admin was called and the packages are being held for dispostion.
